name: Tenacious
description: Tenacious is a fast-paced rogue-lite dungeon crawler with a heavy emphasis on loot. Tear your way through levels and swap gear on the fly to change your abilities. Loot rare items to enhance your abilities. Spend your gold at the forge to create your own play style.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3-i7 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
